STOP-INTERACTION.english: I will stop the execution of the current task.

missedAnswer.english: Sorry, I am not sure I understood correctly. Please select an option on my tablet.

showingOptions.italian: Ti mostrerò le opzioni possibili sul tablet.

0.italian: Posso impostare promemoria per diverse attività. Per favore, dimmi per cosa vuoi impostare un promemoria.

1.english: I can set reminders for $OPTION1$ and for many other activities. Please tell me what you want me to set a reminder for.

0.english: Remind what?
0.italian: Ricordare cosa?

with-keyword.english: Alright, I'll remind you to $KEYWORD$.

without-keyword.english: Fine, I'll remind you about that.

with-keyword.english: Do you want me to remind you to $CONFIRM$?

without-keyword.english: I understood that you asked: '$CONFIRM$'. Is it correct?
without-keyword.italian: Ho capito che mi hai chiesto: '$CONFIRM$'. E' corretto?

0.english: Sorry, I didn't get what should I remind you. Please select an option on my tablet.
0.italian: Mi spiace ma non ho capito cosa ti devo ricordare. Per favore scegli un'opzione sul tablet.

0.english: I'm sorry, but I cannot set reminders in the past. I need to ask you again the date and time for the reminder.
0.italian: Mi spiace ma non posso impostare promemoria nel passato. Devo chiederti nuovamente il giorno e l'orario per il promemoria.

1.english: I also need to know when I should remind you this. Please, notice that the reminder will work only if you select a date and time in which we will meet again.
1.italian: Ho anche bisogno di sapere quando dovrò ricordartelo. Per favore, sappi che il promemoria funziona solo se selezioni un giorno e un orario in cui ci icontreremo di nuovo.

0.english: Excuse me $USERNAME$, remember to $REMINDER$.
0.italian: Chiedo scusa $USERNAME$, ricordati di $REMINDER$.

1.english: Excuse me $USERNAME$, you asked me to remind you this: $REMINDER$.

0.english: Can you tell if you found this reminder useful?
0.italian: Puoi dirmi se hai trovato utile questo promemoria?

1.english: Thanks for telling me.

0.italian: Quando compare il numero di telefono, per favore tocca l'icona della cornetta.

1.english: Please wait a few seconds.

2.english: When the dial pad \pau=300\ appears on the screen, \pau=800\ as a first thing \pau=400\ delete the phone number that you see. \pau=800\ Then, type the phone number that you want to call. \pau=800\ Finally, press on the phone icon.
2.italian: Quando il tastierino numerico \pau=300\ appare sullo schermo, \pau=800\ come prima cosa \pau=400\ cancella il numero di telefono che vedi. \pau=800\ Dopo, digita il numero che vuoi chiamare. \pau=800\ In fine, tocca l'icona della cornetta.

3.english: I cannot find neither the phone number, nor the Skype contact of your $RECIPIENT$ in my address book. \pau=800\Would you like to dial the number yourself?
3.italian: Non trovo né il numero di telefono, né il contatto Skype di $RECIPIENT$ nella mia rubrica. \pau=800\ Vuoi digitare direttamente tu il numero?

4.english: Do you really want to hang up?

5.english: If you want this to be a video call, press the leftmost button below once the call is started.
5.italian: Se vuoi attivare anche il video, premi il tasto in basso a sinistra quando la chiamata è cominciata.

6.english: When the call is over, remember to touch my head.
6.italian: Quando la chiamata è finita, ricordati di toccarmi la testa.

english: Please tell me what I can do for you
Please let's talk together, I am here for you
It's very nice to be here with you
Let's do something. Do you have any idea?
italian: Per favore, fammi sapere cosa posso fare per te

english: Sure. Let's revise your previous answer
No problem! Let's go back to the previous question
Of course! Let me think.  I asked you
italian: Nessun problema. Possiamo cambiare la tua risposta precedente

english: Now we can go back to what we were saying
Let's go back to what we were saying
italian: Torniamo a quello che stavamo dicendo

english: It has been a pleasure talking with you! Goodbye!
italian: è stato un piacere parlare con te! Ciao!

english: I am not sure if I have understood you correctly
Sorry but maybe I haven't understood what you said
Maybe I didn't understand you correctly
italian: Non sono sicuro di aver capito correttamente
Scusa ma forse non ho capito bene cosa hai detto

english: It's nice knowing more about you
Oh ok, now it is more clear
I understand what you said, good to know it!
italian: è bello sapere più cose di te

english: Nice! I will help you in this!
Great, I am happy to be helpful!
Sorry, I do not know exactly what I shall revise
I am sorry, but I do not remember my last question!
italian: Scusa, ma non saprei bene cosa rivedere

english: Sorry, I am not sure I understand, I will repeat my question.
Sorry but I didn't get it. I will repeat my question.
italian: Scusa ma non ho capito. Potresti mica ripetere?

english: Sorry, I am not sure I understand, I will repeat my question.
Sorry but I didn't get it. I will repeat my question.
italian: Scusa ma non ho capito. Ti ripeto la domanda.

english: Please tell me, I'd like to know more.
May I ask you a question?
If you don't mind, I will ask you a question.
I'd love to learn more about this.
I have learned a little about this.
I only know a little about this.
Sorry to ask you this again, but I am not sure.
Maybe I have already asked this, but
italian: Forse te l'ho già chiesto, ma

english: It's very nice to be here with you
I am so happy to be here with you
italian: Salve. Per favore, fammi sapere cosa posso fare per te
Buongiorno. Sono qui a tua disposizione

english: If you don't know what to say, I can show you some of the things that I can do on my tablet. Do you want me to do that?
Do you want me to show some options on my tablet?
italian: Se non sai bene cosa dire, posso mostrarti alcune opzioni sul tablet. Ti va?
Vuoi che ti mostri qualche opzione sul tablet?

english: Is there anything that I can do for you?
Please tell me if I can do something for you
Please tell me what I can do for you
Please tell me something, I am here for you
Let's do something. Do you have any idea?
italian: Per favore, fammi sapere cosa posso fare per te

english: I am happy to be helpful!
I will help you in this
I would like to know more!
I am very curious, let's talk about this
italian: Interessante! Mi piacerebbe saperne di più!

english: Do you want me to revise your previous answer?
We could revise your previous answer. Do you want to do that?
italian: Vuoi modificare la tua ultima risposta?

english: Sure! I will repeat my last sentence!
Do you want me to go now?
Shall I go to rest for a while?
Shall I go to sleep for some time?
Do you want to stop talking?
italian: Vuoi smettere di parlare con me?

english: Ok! It has been a pleasure talking with you! Goodbye!
Goodbye! Thank you for your time!
I hope that I have been helpful! Goodbye
italian: Ciao! Spero di esserti stato di aiuto

english: Great! I am happy that we can keep talking!
Ok, so let's keep talking than!
Glad that I have misunderstood you!
italian: Bene, sono contento che possiamo continuare a parlare
Ottimo, possiamo continuare a parlare allora!

english: Just to be sure, do you want me to
I have understood that you want me to
Let me check, do you want me to
italian: Te lo chiedo per sicurezza, vuoi che

english: Great! Please select what you want me to do for you!

italian: Dimmi pure cosa posso fare per te

english: Do you really want to unblock me?

italian: Sono in pausa. Se vuoi sbloccarmi, dì la parola  sblocca
